about.title: Smart Capital<br class='max-md:hidden' /> and Long-Term Partnership
about.description:
We are a venture firm focused on supporting growing businesses.

We combine capital, strategic expertise, and access to a network of partners to accelerate the evolution of our portfolio companies, building sustainable long-term value.
